TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit InPlaceHostingManager extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

summary.span: 在電腦上安裝或更新 ClickOnce 部署。

span.span: Install or update a ClickOnce deployment on a computer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用撰寫程式的安裝[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]應用程式以程式設計的方式。You can use to write programs that install [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] applications programmatically. 比方說，您可以在受控制的系統管理軟體 (SMS) 環境中，或在需要複雜的安裝，執行數個在本機電腦上的安裝前或安裝後作業的情況下，使用這個類別。For example, you can use this class in a controlled system management software (SMS) environment or in situations where you need a complex installation that performs a number of pre-installation or post-installation operations on the local computer. 一般而言，您會想要在以特定順序中使用這個類別的成員：Generally, you will want to use the members of this class in a specific order: 1. 建立 的新執行個體。Create a new instance of . 2. 下載部署資訊清單使用。Download the deployment manifest by using . 3. 應用程式可以藉由執行的適當權限的核取。Check that the application can be run with the appropriate permissions by using . 4. 下載並安裝應用程式使用。Download and install the application by using . - 如果您呼叫這些參數的任何順序，它們將會擲回例外狀況。If you call any of these parameters out of order, they will throw an exception. 可以安裝[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]應用程式，但無法執行。 can install a [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application, but cannot execute it. 某些方法，在這個類別，例如，已保留供下載的 Windows Presentation Foundation 應用程式的網頁瀏覽器內執行時。Some methods in this class, such as , are reserved for use when downloading a Windows Presentation Foundation-based application that runs inside a Web browser. 若要使用下載及安裝應用程式，您必須確定憑證來簽署[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]您計劃安裝應用程式已安裝用戶端電腦上為受信任的發行者。To use to download and install applications, you must make sure that the certificate for signing the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] applications you plan to install is already installed on client computers as a trusted publisher. 如需有關受信任的發行者的詳細資訊，請參閱[受信任的應用程式部署概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b24a1702-8fbe-45b1-87a0-9618a0708f1d)。For more information on trusted publishers, see [Trusted Application Deployment Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b24a1702-8fbe-45b1-87a0-9618a0708f1d). > [!NOTE] > 目前沒有可防止產品限制無法正常運作當您偵錯程式碼，請使用[!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)]。There is currently a product limitation that prevents from working correctly when you debug your code using [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)]. 如果您偵錯您的應用程式中[!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)]藉由使用 F5 鍵，此範例會擲回神秘的例外狀況呼叫時。If you debug your application in [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)] by using the F5 key, the sample will throw mysterious exceptions when you call . 若要偵錯使用[!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)]、 但不偵錯，啟動應用程式，然後將附加偵錯工具。To debug using [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)], start the application without debugging, and then attach the debugger. 或者，您可以使用另一個偵錯工具，例如 WinDbg。Alternatively, you can use another debugger, such as WinDbg. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用安裝[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]應用程式以程式設計方式在用戶端電腦上。The following code example shows how to use to install a [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application programmatically on a client computer. [!code-csharp[System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager/CS/Form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 建立 的新執行個體，以下載及安裝指定的應用程式。

span.span: Creates a new instance of to download and install the specified application.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Uri deploymentManifest) cil managed

param.name: deploymentManifest
param.span: [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] 應用程式部署資訊清單的統一資源識別元 ()。

span.span: A Uniform Resource Identifier () to a [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application's deployment manifest.

summary.span: 建立 的新執行個體，以下載及安裝指定的瀏覽器架構應用程式。

span.span: Creates a new instance of to download and install the specified browser-hosted application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您想要下載的 Windows Presentation Foundation 應用程式裝載 Web 瀏覽器中，會使用這個建構函式。This constructor is used when you want to download a Windows Presentation Foundation-based application that is hosted in a Web browser. 若要下載 Windows Form 為基礎的應用程式部署使用[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]，使用具有建構函式`launchInHostProcess`參數設定為`false`。To download Windows Forms-based applications that are deployed using [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)], use the constructor with the `launchInHostProcess` parameter set to `false`.

exception.span: 只能在 Windows XP 或較新版本的 Windows 作業系統中使用。

span.span: can be used only in Windows XP or in later versions of the Windows operating system.
Cannot pass for the argument.

exception.span: 使用了 [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] 不支援的 URI 配置。

span.span: uses a URI scheme that is not supported by [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)].

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Uri deploymentManifest, bool launchInHostProcess) cil managed
Public Sub New (deploymentManifest As Uri, launchInHostProcess As Boolean)

param.name: launchInHostProcess
param.span: 指出此應用程式是否將在主機上執行，例如 Web 瀏覽器。

span.span: Whether this application will be run in a host, such as a Web browser.

param.span: 若是獨立的應用程式，則將此值設定為 。

span.span: For a stand-alone application, set this value to .

summary.span: 建立 的新執行個體，以下載及安裝指定的應用程式；這個應用程式可以是獨立的 Windows Form 架構應用程式或是裝載在 Web 瀏覽器中的應用程式。

span.span: Creates a new instance of to download and install the specified application, which can be either a stand-alone Windows Forms-based application or an application hosted in a Web browser.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立執行個體，可讓您下載 Windows Form 為基礎的應用程式部署使用[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]。The following code example demonstrates how to create an instance of that allows you to download Windows Forms-based applications deployed using [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]. [!code-csharp[System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager/CS/Form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager/VB/Form1.vb#2)]

summary.span: 判斷 ClickOnce 應用程式是否有適當的使用權限和平台相依性，得以在本機電腦上執行。

span.span: Determines whether the ClickOnce application has the appropriate permissions and platform dependencies to run on the local computer.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void AssertApplicationRequirements() cil managed

summary.span: 判斷 [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] 應用程式是否有適當的使用權限和平台相依性，得以在本機電腦上執行。

span.span: Determines whether the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application has the appropriate permissions and platform dependencies to run on the local computer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您必須呼叫之後成功傳回。You must call after returns successfully. 您必須呼叫除非您呼叫，它會傳回不會發生錯誤。You must not call unless you call , and it returns without error. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用，它將成功的主體中呼叫此事件處理常式。The following code example demonstrates the use of , which it calls in the body of a successful event handler. [!code-csharp[System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager/CS/Form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager/VB/Form1.vb#3)]

exception.span: 在 方法之前呼叫這個方法時引發。

span.span: Raised if this method is called before the method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void AssertApplicationRequirements(bool grantApplicationTrust) cil managed

param.name: grantApplicationTrust
param.span: 如果為 ，應用程式便會嘗試將其使用權限提高至必要的層級。

span.span: If , the application will attempt to elevate its permissions to the required level.

summary.span: 判斷 [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] 應用程式是否有適當的使用權限和平台相依性，得以在本機電腦上執行。

span.span: Determines whether the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application has the appropriate permissions and platform dependencies to run on the local computer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`grantApplicationTrust`是`true`，就會授與應用程式提高的權限，則當需要它們。If `grantApplicationTrust` is `true`, will grant the application elevated permissions if it requires them. 這樣做才可行，如果能夠授與這些權限。This is only possible if is able to grant those permissions. 例如，如果[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]為較大的封裝的一部分安裝應用程式和安裝程式授與完全信任，能夠授與[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]完全信任的應用程式。For example, if a [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application is being installed as part of a larger package and the installer has been granted full trust, will be able to grant the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application full trust. 如果`grantApplicationTrust`是`false`，應用程式將不會授與任何權限。If `grantApplicationTrust` is `false`, the application will not be granted any permissions.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void CancelAsync() cil managed

span.span: Cancels an asynchronous download operation.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的所有資源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用完畢時，請呼叫 。Call when you are finished using the . 方法會將 保留在無法使用的狀態。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 在呼叫，您必須釋放所有參考讓記憶體回收行程可以回收記憶體的所佔用。After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 在您釋放最後一個 參考之前，請務必呼叫 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否則工作窗格所使用的資源不會釋放，直到記憶體回收行程呼叫 物件的 `Finalize` 方法。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

span.span: Downloads an application update in the background.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您必須呼叫這個方法之後呼叫。You must call this method after calling . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用，它會呼叫成功結尾處的事件處理常式。The following code example demonstrates the use of , which it calls at the end of a successful event handler. 下列程式碼範例假設您有已定義和建立的執行個體名為`iphm`。The following code examples assume that you have already defined and created an instance of named `iphm`. [!code-csharp[System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager/CS/Form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager/VB/Form1.vb#3)]

exception.span: 在 和 方法之前呼叫這個方法時引發。

span.span: Raised if this method is called before the and methods.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Event DownloadApplicationCompleted As EventHandler(Of DownloadApplicationCompletedEventArgs)

summary.span: 在應用程式已完成下載至本機電腦時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the application has finished downloading to the local computer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您要安裝的 Windows Form 應用程式，您必須指示使用者啟動應用程式本身。您無法使用，以程式設計方式啟動 Windows Form 應用程式方法。If you are installing a Windows Forms-based application, you will need to instruct users to launch the application themselves; you cannot start Windows Forms-based applications programmatically by using the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範的處理常式事件。The following code example demonstrates a handler for the event. [!code-csharp[System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager/CS/Form1.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager/VB/Form1.vb#7)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Event DownloadProgressChanged As EventHandler(Of DownloadProgressChangedEventArgs)

summary.span: 在應用程式或資訊清單下載狀態變更時發生。

span.span: Occurs when there is a change in the status of an application or manifest download.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在主控台應用程式中，事件會指派給執行緒從執行緒集區。In a console application, events are assigned to threads from a thread pool. 因此，您可能會收到進度更新事件失序，後續的事件顯示降低相較於先前的事件。Therefore, you might receive progress update events out of order, with a subsequent event showing a decrease compared with a previous event. 因為 Windows Form 中的事件會依序處理，從使用者介面 (UI) 執行緒的訊息佇列，不會看到 Windows Form 應用程式中，這類行為。You will not see such behavior in a Windows Forms-based application, because events in Windows Forms are processed sequentially out of the user interface (UI) thread's message queue. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何更新內包含之。The following code example demonstrates how to update a that is contained within a . [!code-csharp[System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager/CS/Form1.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager/VB/Form1.vb#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjectHandle Execute() cil managed

summary.span: 啟動 [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] 應用程式，但僅限此應用程式是正在 Web 瀏覽器中執行之 Windows Presentation Foundation 架構應用程式的情況。

span.span: Launches the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application, if and only if it is a Windows Presentation Foundation-based application running in a Web browser.
An corresponding to the launched application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法是僅適用於 Windows Presentation Foundation 為基礎的應用程式可以裝載 Web 瀏覽器中 (也就是說，其部署資訊清單定義`hostInBrowser`XML 項目)。This method is valid only for Windows Presentation Foundation-based applications that can be hosted in a Web browser (that is, their deployment manifests define the `hostInBrowser` XML element).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void GetManifestAsync() cil managed

summary.span: 在幕後下載 [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] 應用程式的部署資訊清單，並在作業完成或發生錯誤時引發事件。

span.span: Downloads the deployment manifest of the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application in the background, and raises an event when the operation has either completed or encountered an error.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要接收通知此事件完成時，建立事件處理常式事件。To receive notification of when this event completes, create an event handler for the event. 如果呼叫這個事件，而且沒有錯誤會以，接下來應該呼叫以確認應用程式必須在本機電腦上執行的權限。If this event is called, and no error is indicated by , you should next call to verify that the application will have permission to run on the local computer. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何呼叫方法。The following code examples demonstrate how to call the method. 處理常式事件回呼會檢查以查看顯示下載已順利完成，且如果是的話，會提示使用者與應用程式的其他資訊。The handler for the event callback checks to see if the manifest download completed successfully, and if so, prompts the user with additional information about the application. 如果使用者同意繼續進行安裝時，處理常式會呼叫。If the user agrees to continue the installation, the handler calls . 下列程式碼範例假設您有已定義和建立的執行個體名為`iphm`。The following code examples assume that you have already defined and created an instance of named `iphm`. [!code-csharp[System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager/CS/Form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager/VB/Form1.vb#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager/CS/Form1.cs#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Event GetManifestCompleted As EventHandler(Of GetManifestCompletedEventArgs)

summary.span: 在部署資訊清單已下載至本機電腦時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the deployment manifest has been downloaded to the local computer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來檢查是否順利完成，或傳回錯誤。Use the property of to check whether completed successfully or returned an error. 如果為 null，順利完成，而且您可以呼叫。If is null, completed successfully, and you can call . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何呼叫方法。The following code examples demonstrate how to call the method. 處理常式事件回呼會檢查以查看顯示下載已順利完成，且如果是的話，會提示使用者與應用程式的其他資訊。The handler for the event callback checks to see if the manifest download completed successfully, and if so, prompts the user with additional information about the application. 如果使用者同意繼續進行安裝時，處理常式會呼叫。If the user agrees to continue the installation, the handler calls . 下列程式碼範例假設您有已定義和建立的執行個體名為`iphm`。The following code examples assume that you have already defined and created an instance of named `iphm`. [!code-csharp[System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager/CS/Form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager/VB/Form1.vb#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager/CS/Form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager/VB/Form1.vb#3)]

param.name: subscriptionId

summary.span: 移除包含 <customUX> 項目的 [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] 應用程式。

span.span: Removes a [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application that includes the <customUX> element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會解除安裝先前安裝[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]應用程式，使用``中的項目[ <entryPoint>元素](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/10ad3083-10c1-4189-a870-9bba2eab244f)。This method uninstalls a previously installed [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application that uses the `` element in the [<entryPoint> Element](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/10ad3083-10c1-4189-a870-9bba2eab244f). 自訂安裝程式不會建立的新增或移除程式項目[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]應用程式必須儲存訂用帳戶識別碼，在中找到屬性在安裝期間。Custom installers that do not create an Add or Remove Programs entry for the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application must store the subscription identifier found in the property during installation.
